DOC.brief_summary: The satiety effect combination protein fiber within egg whole grain breakfast meal . High protein low high-fiber hypothesize satiate low protein , low fiber .
DOC.brief_title: Satiety Effects Combination Egg Whole Grains
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects consume 3 different breakfast meal . Satiety measure visual analogue scale ; food intake record subsequent meal well 24 hour food log ; blood glucose response assess follow test meal . Subjects consume ad libitum lunch meal 3.5 hour breakfast meal food intake measure .
DOC.criteria: healthy , nonsmoking , BMI 1827 , nondieting , typically consume breakfast/lunch distaste egg , vegetarian , current smoker , restrain eat habit , recent weight change , history significant disease past medical history , pregnant , lactate irregular menstrual cycle
